HOW TO CANCEL A STUCK $ETH TRANSACTION >Open metamask >Settings>Advanced Enable "advanced gas controls" and "custom nonce" >find your stuck tx nonce on etherscan >send a 0 $ETH tx *with a high enough gas fee* and set the custom nonce to the SAME as the stuck tx nonce. FIXED.
